text: This place is a China landlord own by country Garden management in the night can hear the dormitory workers of country Garden talking loud occupying the foyer hanging out there drinking beer and making noise the rental is not worth small place 570 square feet apartment renting cheap rent but the agents monopoly this place very high deposit they impose agents rob the tenants by imposing agent & agreement fee every year the rental increases  every year your renew the contract they impose this charges  deposit refund late after 1 month u get it back need to chase the agent for the refund pls be careful who ever is happily paying rent not many shops available the mamak shop most of the time no seats to seat and eat

For relax no problem
But hard to find food when midnight time.. and to book grapcar also got problem...

lack of parking.
far from market, mall.
ghost town.
think 2 times if u plan to rent house at forest city.
The Forest City, The Best international Place
